document_data.mainbody: '''''Conjure elemental''''' was a [[conjuration/summoning]] spell that allowed a [[wizard]] to call and control either an [[Air elemental|air]], [[Earth elemental|earth]], [[Fire elemental|fire]] or [[water elemental]].
document_data.Effects: The type of [[elemental]] needed to be fixed during memorization and each required a different material component and a certain amount of the respective element. The spell always carried a certain risk that the conjured elemental would break free. A ''[[protection from evil]]'' provided a defense in that case.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and somatic components, and the element in question, casting this spell required a small amount of burning [[incense]] to conjure an air elemental, of soft [[clay]] for an earth elemental, of [[sulfur]] and [[phosphorus]] for a fire elemental, and [[water]] and [[sand]] for a water elemental.
